arts.ttl: Craig Bellamy hails Wales’s spirit after ‘crazy’ 4-3 defeat against Belgium
arts.athr: Ben Fisher at the King Baudouin Stadium
arts.sum: Visitors’ spirited fightback thwarted by Kevin De Bruyne Manager praises players for their ambition and courage Craig Bellamy said Wales’s stirring comeback, despite Kevin De Bruyne inflicting the first defeat of his tenure in a seven-goal epic in Belgium, is evidence of his team’s changed mindset. The Wales manager said he played in hope across his career but now recognises belief in his squad. Bellamy praised his players after they roused from 3-0 down to draw level at 3-3 before De Bruyne snatched victory in the 88th minute. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: No more "unlucky Wales": Bellamy refuses pity after agonising Belgium defeat
arts.sum: Craig Bellamy says he will take pride from the character that Wales shown in a 4-3 defeat to Belgium in World Cup qualifying on Monday night.

arts.ttl: Craig Bellamy: Wales World Cup qualification hopes alive despite loss to Belgium
arts.sum: Kevin De Bruyne struck a late Belgium winner after the Dragons fought back from three goals down.

arts.ttl: Wales fan in hospital after Belgium stadium fall
arts.sum: The supporter fell from the upper tier into the lower tier at the King Baudouin Stadium in Brussels.

arts.ttl: Craig Bellamy asks Wales players 'to understand' as Belgium accused of 'lack of respect'
arts.sum: Wales fought back from three goals down to level the scores in their World Cup qualifier in Belgium. only for Kevin De Bruyne, the former Manchester City star, to score a winner in a seven-goal thriller

arts.ttl: Highlights: Belgium and Wales play out a thriller
arts.sum: Watch all the action as Belgium beat Wales 4-3 in a thrilling World Cup qualifier.

arts.ttl: Belgium 4-3 Wales: Kevin De Bruyne snatches thrilling win after Craig Bellamy's side mount stunning fightback
arts.sum: Wales came from 3-0 down to equalise in Brussels but still came away empty-handed

arts.ttl: Kevin De Bruyne nets late winner vs. Wales in 4-3 thriller
arts.sum: Kevin De Bruyne came to Belgium's rescue with a winner two minutes from time as they scraped a 4-3 victory over Wales in their World Cup qualifier on Monday.

arts.ttl: Wales suffer dramatic World Cup qualifying defeat to Belgium after fightback
arts.sum: Harry Wilson, Sorba Thomas and Brennan Johnson scored as the Dragons fought back.

arts.ttl: Belgium 4-3 Wales: Incredible comeback ends in Welsh heartbreak amid major drama
arts.sum: The two sides played out a game of two halves in Brussels with the away team so close to a draw
